welcome2: Your pet's health in your hand
name: Name
notify: Notifications are disabled. Enable them in settings to receive reminders

missing: Data is missing to calculate the recommendation.
puppy: Puppy: frequent meals in small quantities (consult your veterinarian).
kitten_Food: Kitten: frequent meals in small quantities (consult your veterinarian).
small_rabbit: Young rabbits: unlimited hay + small portions of feed.
medium_rabbit: Unlimited hay + 25 g/kg/day of feed (3 small meals).
large_rabbit: Unlimited hay + 20 g/kg/day of feed (3 small meals).
giant_rabbit: Unlimited hay + 15 g/kg/day of feed (3 small meals).
small_hamster: Baby hamster: 1 teaspoon of dry mix + small fruits and vegetables.
medium_hamster: 1-2 teaspoons of dry mix per day + fruits and vegetables (2 small meals).

invalid_weight: Invalid weight, please enter a valid number.
